### [Notice of Public Hearing on the City of Hamilton 2025-2026 Fiscal Year Budget.](https://hamiltontexas.com/DocumentCenter/View/1306)

The proposed tax rate .4623 is equal to the no-new-revenue tax rate, is below the voter-approval tax rate, and does not exceed the de minimis rate. Therefore, the proposed tax rate does not exceed the rate that would require an automatic election under Section
26.075
of the Texas Tax Code. If the City of Hamilton adopts the proposed tax rate, it will not be required to hold an election for voter approval, and qualified voters may not petition for an election to reduce the tax rate.

[MA & IRMA Letter - Government Capital](https://hamiltontexas.com/DocumentCenter/View/1282)
